website_summaries.verdict: Choose this model if you are looking for a sleek, effortless design. Otherwise, consider others we reviewed.
pros: Frameless, one-piece rubber blade design is simple to install
Aerodynamic shape eliminates collection of debris around blade
cons: Heavy rain might interrupt the typically smooth operation, particularly after several weeks of use
Pricier than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: These are the same blades that came with my 2011 Silverado which lasted over 3 years in Southern California. Pretty darn good. I had bought some cheapies at Costco when it came time to replace them and they left instant streaks in the rain so I decided to bite the bullet and pay the $20 a piece for a set and I couldn't be more glad. First wipe with them left no streaks or water at all. Clipped on perfectly easy and that's basically all there is to it. They work. Sometimes, you really do get what you pay for, even today.
customer_reviews.author: idratherplaytennis

customer_reviews.title: OMG worked amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so shocked and think will I purchase these ones they worked beyond what I expected great quality materials and I could go on and on. If that doesn't convince you I don't know what we'll get these ones for sure they will not disappoint you
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Valeo Frameless Wiper Blades
customer_reviews.text: These wiper blades are OEM replacement for my pickup truck blades. Easy to install, just pinch the side arrows in, and slide onto the arm until it snaps in place. Been through several big rain storms and excellent job clearing the windshield surface of water.
customer_reviews.author: Cicada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage
customer_reviews.text: Only had them on a week but so far they perform excellent
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Function
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and function, no chatter or streaks. Will have to amend review if durability is an issue. These wipers have performed very well with a lot of "wintery mix" weather of late. Note these are the newer "top lock" style.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It does fit 2017 Ford Explorer
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said it won't fit my 2017 Ford Explorer, it actually does. This is the passenger side one
customer_reviews.author: A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: This is an OE 99.9% match
customer_reviews.text: This is an OE 99.9% match and fits into 2007 Chevy Avalanche wiper arm perfectly. Quality matches that of a GM new wiper. Bravo to Valeo for getting it right.
customer_reviews.author: AbraxusVolta

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipers
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best wipers on the market. I have a Cadillac Escalade and have tried virtually every wiper on the planet. These are the only ones that give even pressure on the window with a clear wipe. They even work exceptionally well when cleaning off bugs! If I could improve on these, it would be to make them last longer. They do need to be changed about every 8 months to remain in top shape.
customer_reviews.author: TODD CHAPMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works great and quiet on my Escalade ESV.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a wiper that doesn't drag and make loud noise on my Escalade! Easy to install, clears well, and quiet. Exactly what I had hoped for after reading these reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work fine, can't say any better than the pair I took off when they were new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipers!  Cant Recomend Enough!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Much better then some other wipers I bought for my truck recently! Easy to install, no brainier. Wipers work so good, its like I have RainX on my windshield!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Valeo 900-22-7B Wiper Blades
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made wiper blades. When I opened the package I thought they were going to be a little bit bigger but they work perfect. They are quiet and have a very well engineered connection to the wiper arm.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wolf

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my 2008 Chevy Silverado HD2500. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2008 Chevy Silverado HD2500. They do not fit this vehicle as the connector does not match. The Amazon garage feature verified that they will fit my vehicle, but they do not.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!! 2008 Chevrolet Silverado. 900227B
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY GOOD blades! Installation was way easy and had a lower profile without the large adapter that other brands make you use. I will be buying more Valeo Frameless ULTIMATE wiper blades for my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and easy to install OEM replacement for my 2500HD truck.
customer_reviews.author: Clarke F.

customer_reviews.title: they were great wipers, bought these
customer_reviews.text: This were originally on my GMC 1500 when i got it, they were great wipers, bought these, aren't performing like the ones i had, but still just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: easy install and flexible for winter
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set. will buy again. easy install and flexible for winter. does a nice even swipe. expect 2 years from them. jim
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: 2012 GMC Sierra
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a 2012 GMC Sierra 2500hd. The wiper does not make full contact on the driver's side. It leaves a 3" wide gap near the center un-wiped.
customer_reviews.author: GMC Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement wipers for 07 tahoe
customer_reviews.text: The original wipers on my 07 tahoe lasted about three years and worked great. I replaced those with bosch wipers every year since then and have never really been happy with how well they perform. These valeo wipers seem to provide the same quality and performance that the original wipers did. I don't know how long they are going to last (I have only had them a month) but they look well built and I am very pleased with them thus far.
customer_reviews.author: David Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Wipe very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2007 GMC Sierra and they fit perfectly and work very well for me and are quieter than my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Frederick

customer_reviews.title: wipers
customer_reviews.text: They work great,just like the stock blades.Hard to find anywhere else except the dealers and then you pay a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dahmen

customer_reviews.title: wiper review
customer_reviews.text: wipers were a perfect fit exactly like the factory wipers. This brand is the one used by GM . Strongly recommend these wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wipers
customer_reviews.text: I could not find wiper blades anywhere in town for my 2010 Chevy truck. Only the dealer had them. The big box parts stores wanted me to change the entire wiper blade arm, not hardly my friend. These are exact replacements for my truck. The originals lasted 2+ years so I will work on the assumption these will get close to the same. They are very well made, just wish they were easier to find locally.
customer_reviews.author: TurkeyMan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Used to work at an automotive parts store and had a Rep give me a set of these for my '07 Silverado. Absolutely loved them and have not bought any other pair since! Expensive, but very well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: PepsiJim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always keeps a clear windshield. I keep a extra set in vehicle just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great wiper blades
customer_reviews.text: Fit easily to vehicle, clean window effectively, and have stayed quiet. For my application, they are also cheaper than the OEM parts for sure.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Best blades ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased these for my Silverado. The first set lasted a little over two years. With other brands I'm lucky to get a year out of them. These are by far the best blades I have found for cleaning and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Olie

customer_reviews.title: 2007 Chevy Avalanche
customer_reviews.text: After trying to find the correct blades at auto zone and Orilleys, I finally found them on amazon, these are the top lock II
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Wayne Webb

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit Honda Civic 2013 as advertised in the web and also length is shoet
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost good. But for 2008 GM SUV, fitting of passenger side end is not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and they are so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and they are so easy to install, they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W White

customer_reviews.title: Great wiper blades
customer_reviews.text: These blades are so much better than what I have been able to buy in the automotive stores. Quiet, no streaking, just great performance. I just put them on, so cannot speak to wear but these Valeo blades provide the best performance I have found for my Tundra.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Zap

customer_reviews.title: The correct part # for a 2011 Ford Escape is 900-20-7B
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the wrong type of Valeo wiper for my 2011 Ford Escape, and had to do a return. So I’m adding this info showing both types. The Ford Escape has a straight arm, and the correct Valeo wiper number is 900-20-7B. Valeo makes two types of 20” wipers. The other one shown in the photo is made for wiper arms that have a “J-hook” at the end and that type will not fit on the Escape. So to summarize; the correct part for a 2011 Ford Escape is 900-20-7B. The incorrect part is 900-20-1B.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance and Durability
customer_reviews.text: These wipers are amazing. No streaks or pressure points, and they haven't shown any signs of wearing out yet (I bought a set for my car three years ago, just recently bought some for my wife when her blades wore out). I'm very picky about visibility, and these are easily the best wipers I've ever had on a car. I had previously used the factory blades and Bosch Icon, but found that both tend to streak and smear a bit over time, if not right out of the package. I'll definitely be ordering these again if the first pair ever wears out, or if I get a new car.
customer_reviews.author: George Eliot

customer_reviews.title: 28" is a fail
customer_reviews.text: Toyota Yaris SE, 28" single wiper - this has detached twice since April 2019. Yep, detached as in fallen off. First time it was cold and it became un-clipped at the wiper arm. Was still in the parking lot, so back on it went. Today The blade came off of the plastic adaptor whick then un-clipped from the wiper arm. In the rain. Sorry but this is just a terrrible wiper for my car as it needs to stay attached to be considered safe.
customer_reviews.author: Coat buying husband

customer_reviews.title: Can survive heat waves and still clear water like new.
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a hot state buy these. I live in Arizona, and as many of you know, it’s hot, and we are not known for rain. I travel up to the mountains in Arizona a few times a month, yes it rains up in the mountains. I have had these for over a year now 15 months, and they are not brittle from the heat and they still are like new when it rains. My whole family uses them and they are the only kind we have not had to replace every 6-10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Central Texas where the weather in the summer is 100 + degrees and in the winter temps can drop below freezing . During the rainy season we can have thunderstorms that drop 10 in of rain in a couple of hours. I previously used more expensive and well-known brands but these wipers last longer are smooth and costs less.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Magana

customer_reviews.title: Backwards attachment
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with 2014 Ford Escape. The attachment to the wiper arm was incorrect and does not include adapters to replace the OEM connection. If you installed, the blade's wind aerodynamics would literally be backwards, and cause drag and lift rather than pressure and down force. Do not purcahse.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very good windshield wipers
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, though can't compare in standard way to other ones on other vehicles as though this set has lasted over 3 years, it's placed on what will be considered a classic vehicle in 6 months...so not used much...like couple thousand miles a year at best. However, it has stood the test of time without withering.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit on Honda Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 22in blade (and its 26in sibling) for our Honda Odyssey because the OEM blades left behind a hazy residue when there was road oil or wax on the windshield (due to city driving and automatic car washes) making it difficult to see at times. These blades were easy to install without any tools. As a pair they were a perfect fit, and the difference in visibility as well as the quietness of operation, from that of other blades is truly amazing. If you're considering these for an Odyssey, be sure to note the 22in bladeis for the passenger side and the 26in bladeis for the driver's side.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Last longer and no chatter
customer_reviews.text: These last a very long time and never ever chatter across the windshield. They are amazing and I fully reccomend them. They are made of great quality and provide excellent water removal even at highway speeds. Recommended for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: this item was not OE.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sizes of this item a size 24 and a size 18 the 24 was OE and the 18 would not even fit my car the attachment that hooks this item to the car was like none I have ever seen on any car and I damaged it trying to put it on so I did not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Big man

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Windshield
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my truck to replace the factory blades which had begun to just leave a streaky mess under light rain. I did lots of reading up on these as compared to other top brands, and ultimately settled on these Valeo wiper blades. So far they are great. I've used them in everything from fog, to a light mist, to a heavy rain, and they work perfectly. My windshield is now crystal clear after just the first pass of the blades. Now, if they hold up through the winter and the the direct sunlight beating them up next summer, I'll be extremely happy with this purchase because they will have been worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Wish it actually came with all the required pieces. Question the quality.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this wiper about a month ago and finally got around to installing it (it just starting raining again heavily) and then to my surprise and dismay, it's missing the clip to keep it in place on the wiper arm. So this is completely useless to me. And since I can't replace it with a wiper with all the necessary pieces. So to no fault of my own, I am out of pocket. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Minnaar

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Winter Blade
customer_reviews.text: I liked the wiper very much at first. As far as blade types go this one did a good job with covering all that it should. Very good. However I just tried them out during a winter storm and not so good. Ice still stuck to them real bad. If winter is not a problem for you then I would recommend them over other blade types UPDATE: Fell apart within one month of use. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: 2008 BMW 328xi Coupe (E92) Wiper Blades
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Valeo 900-24-10B and Valeo 900-18-10B wiper blades for my 2008 328xi Coupe. Fitment is even better than OEM and price is significantly lower than what the dealer charges. The passenger side blade (18 inch) is slightly offset so that it does not ride up on the window trim like the OEM blades installed by my dealer. Installation was quick and straight forward following the enclosed directions. Blades appear to be high quality and are designed to maintain good contact with the windshield. I intend to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: 3" wide middle driver-side streak after 6000 miles, right at eye level
customer_reviews.text: Good at first, but now I've got a 3" wide middle driver-side streak after 6000 miles, right at eye level. I can't see anything wrong with the blade, no obvious tear or anything. The passenger side is still perfect. Maybe I should just view the road out that side?
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Henerey

customer_reviews.title: There are others .
customer_reviews.text: Installed these at beginning of a 500 mile trip. with rain much of the way. Cleaned really well in the beginning, Quiet too. 2 hours into the trip the driver side blade started to make noise at the ends of the movement. Ended up discarding it and bought a cheap unit to take me home. Maybe I had a reject... Update: Now a month old, the second blade has started screeching and skipping on the screen. Definitely not recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wmyrover

customer_reviews.title: Causes streaks that are almost impossible to see through
customer_reviews.text: Everyone raved about these so I bought them... and boy am I disappointed. Something is wrong with the driver's side blade, almost like it doesn't have a tight fit against the windshield, it makes streaks that I cannot see through! It is so dangerous on dark rainy nights. I cannot see anything - to the point I'd rather drive without them on! I tried cleaning it, taking it off and reinstalling, to no avail. The passenger side wiper, which is the 18" seems to work just fine. It is when the drivers side blade swings back across that it eliminates the good swipe the passenger blade just made! Wish I had tested this out before tossing my crappy old blades..
customer_reviews.author: elle pea

customer_reviews.title: OEM quality.
customer_reviews.text: The wipers are OEM quality very well-made the only problem is when they sell them on Amazon they only sell them one at a time not in a pair. That was the only issue other than that Great wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael.....:)

customer_reviews.title: No mention of driver/passenger wipers
customer_reviews.text: I received two blades and both fit the passenger side only because of a small plastic extension ( a point) on the locking unit. Either the one blade was manufactured wrong or not enough info was provided on the product description. Was the blades specific to location on the windshield?
customer_reviews.author: john carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely does NOT fit my 2011 Volkswagen Tiguan! Waited too long to install them and now I can't return them. The attachments do not work for my vehicle. Couldn't even get them on. I'm guessing someone sent me the wrong wipers, but once again, I waited too long and now it's just something I'll hafta remember for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Streaks ater a few weeks.......
customer_reviews.text: When I received the set I purchased and one didn't even have the "guts" inside needed to attach it to the car I should have returned them instead of getting a replacement. These are terrible wipers. 2-3 weeks after I started using them they began streaking. They just seem to be getting worse and worse. Decided to Rain-x my windshield thinking it may help. At this point I am better off not using the wipers and letting the water run off thanks to the rain-x.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: not great but not horrible.
customer_reviews.text: good wiper blades. i live in southern california so i don't go through wiper blades that often. fortunately for me, i installed these a couple of days before a "storm" (light rain?). unfortunately, however, one of the wipers does not wipe adequately. it leaves a pretty broad strip of rain water in the middle of my screen, as if it's not sitting well or getting enough pressure against the windshield. i switched the wipers between sides and the problem persisted on the opposite side this time so it could not have been a wiper arm issue or a windshield issue. price was good and this was a minor inconvenience so i'll try again and see if there's a different result.
customer_reviews.author: v.

customer_reviews.title: passenger side works fine, driver's side leaves a 3 inch streak near the middle
customer_reviews.text: These blades work ok but for some reason there is a 3" wide streak that doesn't get cleaned off on the driver's side at about the middle of the wiper blade. Not sure why this happens - but it's not driving related. The streak has been there since I first installed the blades and it remains no matter the speed of the car or the amount of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Great wipers and much cheaper than having a dealer or auto mechanic put them on. My husband graciously mounted the wipers on my BMW 328 but it was easy enough that I could have done it myself. Had never realized the wipers on my car are different lengths until I measured to order this set. These wipers hug the windshield well enough to swipe the rain completely off and make visibility excellent. So far, they doing a great job with snow as well. The wipers are operating silently with none of the annoying sticky sound that some wipers emit when the window is partially dry. These are worth the price. Don't know about longevity but so far - so good.
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Perspective

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wiper for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wiper for a good price. The quality of this wiper is high and the price to value ratio is great! I've bought this brand a few times for several of my family's vehicles and they've also been consistent in quality. The one piece blade design is better than the metal bracket type in that it provides consistent pressure across the length of the blade. The fin edge on the top side of the wiper is excellent during highway driving since it forces the wiper to stay against the windshield and results in better wiping at higher speeds. I recommend this wiper.
customer_reviews.author: Alemore

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wiper blades that I have found to actually fit my 2008 Toyota 4Runner Limited. High quality, long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Mercedes
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits my 2004 Mercedes-Benz C240 4matic. I believe it should fit all the W203 Chassis. This is the only wiper I could find the proper Top lock Gen 1. It is a slide lock where the V wedge from the wiper arms sits in the notch and slide locks closed. The wiping function are thorough and absolutely quiet in all positions. Picture on the left are old blades, the right side is the new Valeo blade.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So Quiet you think a ninja came and cleaned your windshield
customer_reviews.text: Stealthy quiet wipers no chatter or streaks. Cleans so well that with every swipe the windshield looks brand new. Also cleans and wipes so well that the sides of your car will be extremely dirty because of all the gunk and grime it will be wiping away that ends up sticking to your car. Handles snow , downpouring rain with ease. Best wipers yet! This was for an Audi A6 C6. Better than OEM and Bosch Icons.
customer_reviews.author: Teachh

customer_reviews.title: longest lasting windshield wipers I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had these on my 2012 Silverado in Houston since November 2016. These are the longest lasting wipers I've ever owned. Its finally time to replace them. Not because they are streaking but because I noticed a 1" tear on 1 of them which would cause me to fail inspection. Highly recommend these wipers
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: One of best wipers on market
customer_reviews.text: Bought the best available, these. I don't like wipers that last for just months or even 1-year. These clean the window with out streaks and last years.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kakuk

customer_reviews.title: Far less quality than they used to be many years ago, look for some other brand
customer_reviews.text: When Valeo first came out with this style of wiper blades back 15 to 20 years ago, it was about $80-90 a pair. Crazy expensive, made in France and they were unbelievable and worked just perfect with no noise, no skid, no problems and last at least 3 years with proper routine cleaning. Now the prices are much lower and the quality went with it to a much lower level. More people can afford to buy them but yet they have to buy them more often as they don't last. Sometime the older things are better built, last longer and have much higher quality, these blades are disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: phoenixlegend

customer_reviews.title: Fits Audi A8L 2004
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my showtime 2004 Audi A8L wiper blades. Work and fit perfectly. This vehicle has a unique attachment system for wiper blades and replacements are not usually available at Big Box stores. Audi charges too much for OEM's. These are perfect, but be sure you go on-line and get the installation instructions if you don't have access to a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Fly BoyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: 2008 Audi A4 Sedan... IT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness, it actually fit!!!!! I purchased the Trico initially, but they didn't fit the style of arm that the Audi had. universal mount, HA, wrong. Amazon fit tool... wrong. This one was actually correct for my Audi. These took less than a minute to replace, each, and seem to work great as I haven't had many rainy days to test out yet. If you are getting sizes, 2 22" blades will do the trick. If you go larger, make sure that the other side shrinks. You should be able to do a 24" and a 20", but I didn't want to go away from what was stock on my car.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle Money

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Pontiac G8
customer_reviews.text: Unlike another reviewer I didn't have to adjust these at all for my 2008 Pontiac G8 GT. The 15" blade is very hard to find locally, so I decided to order this one based on the reviews. Fit perfectly and was installed in less than five seconds. Slid into place with no issue and is operating perfectly. Very silent pair of blades - I also installedand tested them in some very heavy rain. No complaints. I'll update this when they need to be replaced so there's a wear estimate for installation on a daily use car in a high heat / salt area.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet, however, a pain to install as the attachment that snaps into the J-Hook on your car wipers is detachable. Therefore, you must hold and insert just right or it will keep falling off. Once attached to wiper arms you are all set to go. I like that they have a CAP COVER as Bosch stopped putting cap-covers on some of their models which makes the wiper look cheap! I switched from Bosch as their products have become inferior like most things these days. Hope these will last at least 1 year as I garage my car so not exposed to the elements much!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not for Winter weather, although great for rain.
customer_reviews.text: I only give these 2 stars because they are labeled all season, however are terrible for northern US winters. The problem is that snow and ice easily build up on this and stick to the wipers. once this happens and it will if you are driving in sub 32 degree weather then they become in-effective. When it is just water or a light wet snow on the windshield they work amazing, and running my windshield washer fluid they really wipe the salt off the windshield well. However the fact that ice builds up on these so easily makes them not a good winter wiper. I would not buy these unless i lived in the lower half of the states.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: These wiper blade look and feel like excellent quality. They installed very easily. I was looking forward to the first rain to try them out. However, the first use was less than satisfying. They wipers chattered and groaned horribly. It was so irritating that I took my chances with low visibility just to keep from hearing the terrible noise. Seems that from the reviews I may have got a lemon but wouldn't you know, the window for returns has closed. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M Evans

customer_reviews.title: no customer support.
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 different sizes of the valeo frameless ultimate wipers. after driving a couple of days both of the latch caps that prevent the wiper from coming off had popped open. after closing them they continued to open. i found that a mild downward press on the wiper would cause the latch to pop open. i contacted valeo via their web page a received the message "Thank you for contacting us! We will be in contact with you shortly.", but that was a week ago & i never heard back. find yourself a vendor that supports their product.
customer_reviews.author: S Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit 2013 smart car fortwo BUT...(must read)
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 smart fortwo electric. These (Valeo 9002110B 21") are incompatible with the passenger side wiper arm which they are intended for. I also purchased the driver side wipers (Valeo 900238B 23") and they are compatible (have proper fitting) with the drivers side wiper arm. Comparing the two boxes I noticed two different descriptions over the large word 'ULTIMATE'. On the passenger's side box (9002110B 21") it reads "Top-Lock Push Button Connection". On the driver's side (900238B 23") box it reads "Top-Lock Connection". So if you have a smart car, heads up.
customer_reviews.author: FormFunction

customer_reviews.title: Great experience and excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. Unfortunately I ordered the wrong size (I ordered two 24'' blades to replace my front windshield wiper blades, but I actually needed one 24'' blade and one 18'' blade). However, I could not be more pleased with the return process - they refunded my order and I didn't have to ship the product back, which is something I have never experienced before! I have already ordered the "right" size for my second wiper blade (18'') and I am pleased with the 24'' blade that I already have. I am very impressed with the product AND the service.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: these wiper blades have been working great for me this past summer
customer_reviews.text: A word to 2008-2012 Honda Accord sedan owners: These will not fit unless you remove the covers on your car's wiper arms. If you don't remove the covers, these Valeo wiper blades will not click shut. Aside from that little bit of advice, these wiper blades have been working great for me this past summer. I have had these installed since April 2016 and it's not October 2016. I hope these last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Look fine and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wipers while Amazon had them on sale last month. Installation was a breeze, took less than 2 minutes to get them in place. I've been using the wipers for a few weeks now as my area gets into its rainy season. At all driving speeds and levels of precipitation, the wipers are smooth, quiet, and clear away water perfectly. As long as they keep working this well in the future, I'll continue to buy this brand and model. Just make sure you identify the correct size for your vehicle before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for VW Passats
customer_reviews.text: Cost 3x at the stealerships, takes seconds to replace. This wiper design, unfortunately, doesn't lend itself to just replacing the rubber strip. so one has to buy entire assembly. Note that the pivoting plastic lock piece , in the center of the blade, can be easily swapped out by pushing out the metal pin in the center. I used a center punch, but it could also be gently tapped out etc. You might need to perform this very simple procedure (takes seconds) if your original blade and the replacement one have different type locking pieces.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great! I was sick of having to purchase new wipers every couple months, found some great reviews on these on TireRack, purchased a set mid last year and they're still going strong. Bought this one for another car since the others have been so good. As far as how well they do their job, seem about the same as any other wiper.
customer_reviews.author: carlinux

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement wipers.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of wipers for my daily driver. The last set I bought was a different brand and they started squeaking and streaking within 3 months. I have now had these on the car for more than 3 months and they are still perfectly quiet. I will stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pontiac G8 GT
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, this is a replacement blade for the 2008 Pontiac G8 GT. I needed new wiper blades and with a tropical storm / hurricane coming in I didn't want to wait for the dealer to order them. Very easy installation and (so far) silent operation in heavy rain. I will update this review when I replace the blade to give an estimate of their life span for daily driver / tropical heat use. I also ordered. Granted, these cost a bit more than the dealer blades but it is impossible to find a matched set for a Pontiac G8 in stock locally.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: If you have an recent Audi, this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have an recent Audi, this is the OEM wiper. Mine is a 2012 Q5 and it took a 20" and a 24". Replacement took SECONDS to complete. This was By Far, the easiest wiper installation/replacement I have ever done, in 37 years of driving - and, it's the EXACT fit. A single button to remove it (after putting the wipers in the Service Position via the MMI) and the new one slide right into place. Just follow the diagram on the box. As for Amazon, I ordered it on Friday night using Prime, It arrived Monday by noon - shipping was free. Not too shabby...
customer_reviews.author: ErinTheBlack

customer_reviews.title: 2008 BMW 328xi Coupe WIper Blades
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Valeo 900-24-10B and Valeo 900-18-10B wiper blades for my 2008 328xi Coupe. Fitment is even better than OEM and price is significantly lower than what the dealer charges. The passenger side blade (18 inch) is slightly offset so that it does not ride up on the window trim like the OEM blades installed by my dealer. Installation was quick and straight forward following the enclosed directions. Blades appear to be high quality and are designed to maintain good contact with the windshield. I intend to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Little plastic junk part that helps hold wiper to wiper arm :-(
customer_reviews.text: The wipers are ok, but the little plastic part broke that helps hold the wiper to the wiper arm ! I ordered these wipers at the end of November and now it is past the warranty!! I have had these wipers on my truck and I am retired and DO NOT drive my truck very often. I would say I never used the wipers more than 5 to 7 times and not for very long periods of time. I am more mad at the cheapness of this little product ! I would not recommend this product to a friend !
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Not for my F350
customer_reviews.text: While I have had success with Valeo in the past (RX-7 and Toyota Pickup), on my 1995 F-350 I haven't found anything but Motorcraft that fit the curve of the windshield. With these wipers they would skip over the most important part of the viewing area directly in front of the driver every time on the "upstroke" and get a little of the rain when parked on the "downstroke" but if the truck was moving, forget it and lean over to the passenger side. Tried Goodyears from Costco, better but still unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible with 2009+ BMW despite what Amazon check says
customer_reviews.text: Please note that these blades do NOT fit BMW 2009+ 328 side-pinch lock, despite what Amazon "check-fit" says and despite what package has on picture. 1-star for confusing / incorrect picture on packaging/insert 5-star for valeo support.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: 3 Week Weak Wiper...
customer_reviews.text: The wiper wiped beautifully for about one week of daily driving and wiping the Seattle rains away. I started noticing a small area that wasn't being wiped as well after that week. Now after about 3 weeks of use the wiper is leaving an approximate 4" wide wipe path un-wiped....not completely un-wiped, but un-wiped enough that it's bothersome and unseeable through. It's right in the middle and right in my line of sight. At slower speeds it's okay, but it's bad at 70 mph. I have a feeling that I'll be replacing the wipers a lot sooner than I have had to with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: WheelJouster

customer_reviews.title: A good wiper at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I have this wiper in my garage ready to install when my other wiper needs to be replaced. I was a little disturbed that the box that the wiper came in was battered, but I examined the wiper and it looked ok. I contacted Valeo about their warranty and was shocked to hear that I had to deal with the seller (Amazon) for warranty. Amazon offers only thirty day returns and by the time I install the wiper, the thirty days will be up. I think Valeo, a well known wiper blade manufacturer, should handle the warranty coverage on their products beyond the thirty days offered by Amazon. I think Amazon agrees.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Detjen

customer_reviews.title: These give a quality wipe.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best wiper blades I've used. Fit my 2010 Saab 9-3 perfectly and have given me 1.5 years and counting of good service. I'm in an area that gets its fair share of torrential rain so they get a workout and the rubber/whatever material holds up well. The cost is a little high...but if they last 2 years then they've done as well as cheaper wipers that I had to replace each year. *** update *** Made it 3 years before needing replacement. Definitely going with Valeo again.
customer_reviews.author: AlBSure

customer_reviews.title: 2009 Audi A4 B8 - Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 2009 Audi A4 B8. I had previously use the Bosch 3397007297 Original Equipment Replacement Wiper Blade - 24"/20" (Set of 2) and those worked better than the wipers the dealer had put on my car but these seem to hug my windshield a little better and for roughly the same price. Install took about 1 minute for both wipers. Keep in mind that you may need to buy two different sizes for your car. I needed a 24" and a 20" wiper.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit truck
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these a couple of months ago (end of August), but just went to use them but they are the wrong size. Should be 7B instead of 8B. Need to exchange for correct size but I'm not seeing the option.
customer_reviews.author: beachgal

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2006 Volkswagen Jetta
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 2006 Volkswagen Jetta - Amazon's vehicle match tool indicated that this is a proper part for my car. It's not even close to fitting. I did verify the part # on the box and it's a 900-19-7B. The mounting on the wiper arm on my car is completely different. Given the cost of the wiper, and the time to box and ship it back it's hardly worth trying to send it back and get the right one. My advice to Amazon shoppers is to verify part numbers against a second source. Don't completely trust the Amazon Garage Parts matching tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shindler

customer_reviews.title: Works well will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give these a try after reading the reviews. I swear by Bosch Icons and have used them religously over the years. I don't know if Bosch has changed the rubber/plastic compound in their wipers but I am not having the same results from recent purchases as I have had previously. The Valeo wipers are as good as the Bosch's. I put them on a 2005 Kia Amanti , so far they are streak free and quiet. They have worked well in the rain and snow for a considerable lower price than the Bosch. I change my wipers about every 6 months
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: These Blades are Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have the 26" on one vehicle and the 22" on another and they are all superior to any other blade we have used. They are quiet, even with a dry or almost dry windshield and clear the windshield in the heaviest downpour. They don't lift or streak in heavy crosswinds or at highway speeds. We do not yet have long term service with these blades but we have had a set in use for a year, they still preform like new. (We keep the cars in the garage when not in use, which probably helps.) Delivery was reasonably quick and the price was reasonable. Occasionally Amazon puts these blades on sale with exceptionally good pricing and free delivery!
customer_reviews.author: edcaroleg

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but streaking when new, twice.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two driver's side wiper replacements from Valeo and both streak a bit right out of the box. One was really bad, the other was just a bit noticeable. Slightly disappointing but the fit is good and they don't make any noise. I'll probably try them one more time before I go to another brand. Update - The second Valeo I purchased continued to get worse so I've downgraded this rating to one star. I've switched to the Bosch Icons and so far so good. But their reviews say that they streak too soon also so we'll see...
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brasky

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2005 Audi A8's
customer_reviews.text: They look like quality wiper blades, but I had to return them becsuse they dont fit the connection on my 2005 Audi A8. Its an uncimmon connection, but Amazon said it would fit my car, and then did not in the end. These wiper blades fit the more common hook attachment the wiper arm.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Olsen

customer_reviews.title: not bad, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have used Valeo frameless wipers in the past, and just ordered a new set. They lasted a little over a year, not bad, not amazing. Unfortunately this particular model of wiper does not work with or include an adapter for a pin style mount. The description does not make this clear, though one of the secondary photos shows the packaging that states "J-hook" style wipers. This seems to be the only style that they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Used on Pathfinder
customer_reviews.text: These wiper blades worked well for about 1.5 years on our 98 pathfinder. Towards the end of their life the window would have a slightly blur look (like someone put petroleum jelly on the window) during light rains. We replaced them with the Valeo 600-22 series wiper. Pros: Fits well, does a good job wiping fully windshield, no skipping/jumping noticed. Cons: Lasted 1.5yr, the area where the wiper arm attaches sticks up a little higher than a normal wiper blade. Maybe 1/2" or so. Seemed a little odd but you'll get use to it. It is worth a try over most conventional wiper blades, just don't expect them to last more than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Meticulous

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have had these on different cars over the last few years and they worked very well. These didn’t last six months and they are hard, streaky, noisy and won’t lay flat. They are on a Range Rover, but the car shouldn’t make any difference. Very unhappy, so headed back to PIAA...
customer_reviews.author: Desertdog

customer_reviews.title: Best Replacement Wipers
customer_reviews.text: I've tried OEM replacements, as well as more popular brands and less expensive brands. They do not compare to Valeo. All worked fine for the first few months, but Valeo holds up better over time. This makes Valeo cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Goobstercars

customer_reviews.title: Nice wiper, happy to recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this wiper. Decently priced. Has a minimalistic look and that's fine with me. Completely wipes my 2011 Sienna windshield very clean and no stuttering. It was streaking at first but after about 15 or so minutes the streaks disappeared and the windshield looked great. I always worry about the 28" size cleaning across the whole range of movement of the wiper arm and this did great. Seems to have a good build quality too. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Damage Inc XLE

customer_reviews.title: the best windshield wiper on the market
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best windshield wiper on the market. I live in South Dakota and we see weather ranging from above 100F in the summer to negative 30F in the winter and these things hold up. My last pair were just over 2yrs old when I decided to replace them. They work wonderfully at highway speeds without lifting off the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not good as rear wiper blade
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a 2014 Chrysler minivan rear window, but it streaked bad from the beginning. That blade is a 1 star. I gave it a 2 on average for the brand, since I put them on the windshields on the minivan and my car. They seem okay now, but the first couple months they were noisy and made that irritating squeal/rub noise, so as windshield wipers I would say 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

product_meta.title: Valeo 900227B Frameless ULTIMATE 22" All-Season OE Replacement Wiper Blade
product_meta.description:
Style:900227B| Size:22"Valeo Wiper Blades provide optimum visibility in all types of driving conditions. The Ultimate blade has a revolutionary flat blade design that is like a single piece of rubber unlike the other blades that have two pieces of rubber glued together. This blade offers you the quietest performance with no vibration or chatter because of the patented 1,500 pressure points on the blade when moving across the windshield versus a conventional blade with only 4 to 8 pressure points. The blade is easy to install and fits most vehicles.

AMAZON.COM



Valeo Wiper Blades provide optimum visibility in all types of driving conditions. The Ultimate blade has a revolutionary flat blade design that is like a single piece of rubber unlike the other blades that have two pieces of rubber glued together. This blade offers you the quietest performance with no vibration or chatter because of the patented 1,500 pressure points on the blade when moving across the windshield versus a conventional blade with only 4 to 8 pressure points. The blade is easy to install and fits most vehicles.

ULTRA-FLAT PROFILE
The even blade-to-windshield pressure distribution is a result of the integrated flexors. Enjoy optimum visibility along with best-in-class aerodynamics thanks to the integrated windspoiler and ultra-flat design. The air pressure on the spoiler and the ultra-flat design improve blade-to-windshield contact at higher speeds.Enhanced aero-acoustics reduce wind noise up to 3dB.

TEC3 RUBBER TECHNOLOGY
Tec3 Advanced Rubber Technology provides smoother and quieter wiping performance. There's no metal superstructure to collect snow and ice, making the Valeo 900 series the ultimate all-season wiper blade.

SIMPLE INSTALLATION
The Valeo 900 series offers an aftermarket upgrade for conventional design blades with a hook arm installation. There's a wide range of blades available from 18 to 28 inches with strong coverage of domestic and import vehicles.



WHAT KIND OF VALEO WIPER BLADE IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
Worldwide #1 in the wiper systems market, Valeo provides styling and innovative technologies that offer solutions to windshield shape constraints. Valeo's comprehensive range of attractive and efficient front and rear wiper arms and blades are easily adaptable to all vehicle types.

>  BEAM STYLE WIPERS
CONVENTIONAL STYLE WIPERS
feature_bullets: Best-in-class aerodynamics attributed to the integrated spoiler - High-speed performance
No metal superstructure to collect ice and snow - The Ultimate all-season wiper blade
New Tec3 advanced rubber technology - Quiet wipe and longer life
Even blade-to-windshield pressure attributed to the integrated flexors (1,500+ pressure points) - Optimum visibility and long lasting, durable performance
Testing by a leading consumer magazine rated the Valeo 900 one of the top performing blades available today
New Tec3 advanced rubber technology offers quiet wipe and longer life
Optimum visibility and long lasting, durable performance due to the even blade-to windshield pressure attributed to the integrated flexors (1,500+ pressure points)
Easy to install with no adapter required
Valeo wipers help to improve driver safety and confidence by providing optimum visibility in all weather conditions
